MVI Reg0, 1       - 30 01 - 00110000 00000001
OUT Reg0          - D0 00 - 11010000 00000000
MVI Reg1, 2       - 34 02 - 00110100 00000010 
OUT Reg1          - D4 00 - 11010100 00000000
MOV Reg1, Reg0    - 24 00 - 00100100 00000000
OUT Reg1          - D4 00 - 11010100 00000000
SUB Reg0, Reg1    - 51 00 - 01010001 00000000
OUT Reg0          - D0 00 - 11010000 00000000
ADD Reg0, Reg1    - 41 00 - 01000001 00000000
OUT Reg0          - D0 00 - 11010000 00000000
SHL Reg0, Reg0    - 60 00 - 01100000 00000000
OUT Reg0          - D0 00 - 11010000 00000000
SHR Reg0, Reg0    - 70 00 - 01110000 00000000
OUT Reg0          - D0 00 - 11010000 00000000
SHL Reg1, Reg0    - 64 00 - 01100100 00000000
OUT Reg1          - D4 00 - 11010100 00000000
SHR Reg0, Reg1    - 71 00 - 01110001 00000000
OUT Reg0          - D0 00 - 11010000 00000000
MVI Reg2, 15      - 38 0F - 00111000 00001111
OUT Reg2          - D8 00 - 11011000 00000000
ST Reg2, Reg2     - 1A 00 - 00011010 00000000 
OUT Reg3          - DC 00 - 11011100 00000000
LD Reg3, Reg2     - 0E 00 - 00001110 00000000
OUT Reg3          - DC 00 - 11011100 00000000
JMP, 0            - E0 00 - 11100000 00000000
